page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: Fishing is the most popular participant sport in the U.K. There is a waiting list of 2 to 3 years in this area to become a member of a club in order to obtain a fishing licence. During the past 10 to 15 years there has been an improvement in the level of pollution in the Rivers Trent and Derwent. 100 years ago salmon was found in the rivers at Shardlow. More fish are now able to live in the waters and fishermen find Roach, Bream Barbel, Perch and Gudgeon. By the end of 1986 the use of lead weights will be illegal. 99% of the fishermen use lead weights in spite of the death of many swans from lead poisoning,although more fishermen are being more careful about leaving nylon thread and lead weights on the bank side.
